meanings.definition: A rare mineral consisting of beryllium aluminum silicate.
meanings.sent1: The geologist found a beautiful specimen of phenacites during the excavation.
meanings.sent2: She wore a necklace adorned with a shimmering phenacites gemstone.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel mistook the phenacites for a precious acorn.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like phenacites under the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The phenacites glowed with an otherworldly radiance.

meanings.definition: A type of gemstone often used in jewelry.
meanings.sent1: The jeweler carefully set the phenacites into the silver ring.
meanings.sent2: He gifted her a pair of earrings featuring rare phenacites.
meanings.sent3: The playful kitten batted at the dangling phenacites on the bracelet.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as the sparkling phenacites in the pendant.
meanings.sent5: The phenacites added a touch of elegance to her ensemble.
